file_insights.description: Abstract base class for data processing tasks
modifications: Added comprehensive docstrings to Task class
Added docstrings to key methods: add_input(), transform(), add_common_yaml()

patterns_discovered: Abstract base class with optional configuration attributes
Support for different data processing engines (Spark, DuckDB)
gotchas_discovered: Task methods are mostly abstract or have minimal implementations
Flexible input types (Hive table or DataFrame)
Complex configuration options with multiple optional parameters

approach_outcome.changes_made: Added detailed documentation explaining class structure, methods, and usage patterns

recommendations: Maintain consistent docstring format across task implementations
Consider adding type hints for better IDE and static type checking support
Create comprehensive examples for different task types and configurations
